price: Òun ni Allāhu (Ẹni tí a gbọ́dọ̀ jọ́sìn fún ní ọ̀nà òdodo) nínú àwọn sánmọ̀ àti nínú ilẹ̀. Ó mọ ìkọ̀kọ̀ yín àti gban̄gba yín. Ó sì mọ ohun tí ẹ̀ ń ṣe níṣẹ́.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱللَّهُ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَفِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ يَعۡلَمُ سِرَّكُمۡ وَجَهۡرَكُمۡ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa al-lahu fī al-samāwāti wafī al-arḍi yaʿlamu sirrakum wajahrakum wayaʿlamu mā taksibūna
